channel.title: What a Trip on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in What a Trip on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Psychedelic Therapy Crashed and Burned. MAHA Might Bring It Back
item.description: Abuse allegations and infighting helped kill a campaign to legalize MDMA for medical use. Trumpworld is giving the therapy’s advocates hope for a second shot.
